snippet: Perique gets its distinctive flavor from barrel fermentation, a technique Louisiana settlers are thought to have picked up in the 18th or 19th century from the local Choctaws.
abstract: Rare perique tobacco is seeing a nearly miraculous recovery after crop was on verge of extinction; perique gets its distinctive pungent flavor from barrel fermentation, a technique Louisiana settlers are thought to have picked up in 18th or 19th century from local Choctaws.
lead_paragraph: Perique gets its distinctive flavor from barrel fermentation, a technique Louisiana settlers are thought to have picked up in the 18th or 19th century from the local Choctaws.

headline.main: Tobacco Lovers Discover Mystique of Perique
headline.print_headline: Tobacco Lovers Discover Mystique of Perique
